mod_plot module

mod_plot.create_movie(ds_passes, name_var='ssha', method='SWOT', region='GS', lonlat_minmax=[309, 314, 30, 42], time0=numpy.datetime64, ndays=38, dir_output='../figures/', dim_name=['time', 'latitude', 'longitude'], framerate=3, Display=True, clim=[- 0.6, 0.6], cmap='Spectral', newmovie=False)
